name: Guelph Family Health Team - Diabetes Care Guelph
comment:
Supports for people living with prediabetes or diabetes * one-on-one or group consultation on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff
  • insulin initiation, dosage management
  • access to registered kinesiologist and mental health counsellor
  • diabetes wellness workshops

Guelph Family Health Team - Diabetes Care Guelph

Supports for people living with prediabetes or diabetes * one-on-one or group consultation on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff<ul><li>insulin initiation, dosage management</li><li>access to registered kinesiologist and mental health counsellor</li><li>diabetes wellness workshops</li></ul>

description_of_this:
Supports for people living with prediabetes or diabetes * one-on-one or group consultation on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff
  • insulin initiation, dosage management
  • access to registered kinesiologist and mental health counsellor
  • diabetes wellness workshops
